column5: Well I can't figure out how to shrink my pics before posting. All are pretty much 200k and the maximum upload is 250. I guess I am gonna have to post one pic at a time. If anyone knows how I can reduce them, let me know. I have some nice pics of lakes too but I want to post pics with fish in 'em. So I will do a little of both.
Nice brookie.  I post using photobucket. http://photobucket.com/ I downsize first to 600x800 and then upload. Finally I post the img code right on the post page.
